Package it.polimi.ingsw.common

Interface VirtualPresenter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Presenter, RmiPresenter, SocketPresenter
    public interface VirtualPresenter
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The interface that declares all the methods that the Presenter must have.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void askActivateWeapon​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user already "activated" the "shoot" action and wants to activate the weapon he wants to use.
      void askCardInfo​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user wants to know some information about a specific card.
      void askCollect​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user already "activated" the "collect" action and wants to perform it.
      void askCreateGame​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user asks to create a new game.
      void askInfoPowerUp​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user wants to know some information about a specific power up.
      void askReload​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user wants to reload a weapon.
      void askUseAlternative​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user already "activated" the weapon card and wants to use the alternative effect.
      void askUseOptional1​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user already "activated" the weapon card and wants to use the first optional effect.
      void askUseOptional2​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user already "activated" the weapon card and wants to use the second optional effect.
      void askUsePowerUp​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user wants to use a power up.
      void askUsePrimary​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user already "activated" the weapon card and wants to use the primary effect.
      void endAction​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user wants to end the action he is performing now.
      void endOfTurn​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user wants to end his turn.
      void moveAction​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user already "activated" the "move" action and wants to perform it.
      void remoteDisconnect​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user wants to disconnect himself from the server.
      void selectAction​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user needs to decide which action he wants to perform (run, collect, etc...).
      void selectGame​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user asks to enter in a game that has already been created either by himself or someone else.
      void selectPlayerId​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user wants to set his player id.
      void spawn​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user asks to spawn in a certain square, either in the first turn or after he dies.
      void voteBoard​(java.lang.String value)
      Method that is called when the user asks to vote the board he prefers.

    • Method Detail

      • remoteDisconnect

        void remoteDisconnect​(java.lang.String value)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user wants to disconnect himself from the server.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the name of this method.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • selectPlayerId

        void selectPlayerId​(java.lang.String value)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user wants to set his player id.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the name that the user chose.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askCreateGame

        void askCreateGame​(java.lang.String value)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user asks to create a new game.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the name of the new game, the number of deaths and a boolean that says if the user wanted to play with the final frenzy mode.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • selectGame

        void selectGame​(java.lang.String value)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user asks to enter in a game that has already been created either by himself or someone else.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the name of the game and the character he wants to be.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • voteBoard

        void voteBoard​(java.lang.String value)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user asks to vote the board he prefers.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the integer of the board he wants to use.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • spawn

        void spawn​(java.lang.String value)
    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user asks to spawn in a certain square, either in the first turn or after he dies.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the name of the power uo he wants to discard and its color.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • selectAction

        void selectAction​(java.lang.String value)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user needs to decide which action he wants to perform (run, collect, etc...).
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the integer of the action he wants to perform.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • moveAction

        void moveAction​(java.lang.String value)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user already "activated" the "move" action and wants to perform it.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with color and the integer that identify the square the user wants to reach.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askCollect

        void askCollect​(java.lang.String value)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user already "activated" the "collect" action and wants to perform it.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with an optional integer that says which card the user wants to collect, that (if it's present) can be followed by an optional integer that says which card the user wants to discard, and eventually a String that says with which power ups the user wants to pay the cost of the card
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askActivateWeapon

        void askActivateWeapon​(java.lang.String value)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user already "activated" the "shoot" action and wants to activate the weapon he wants to use.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the integer of the card that the user wants to activate.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askUsePrimary

        void askUsePrimary​(java.lang.String value)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user already "activated" the weapon card and wants to use the primary effect.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with all the information needed to use the said effect: target(*name of the character*) destination(*colorOfSquare-numberOfSquare*) powerup(powerUpName-color). All these are optional, and need to be written only if necessary.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askUseAlternative

        void askUseAlternative​(java.lang.String value)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user already "activated" the weapon card and wants to use the alternative effect.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with all the information needed to use the said effect: target(*name of the character*) destination(*colorOfSquare-numberOfSquare*) powerup(powerUpName-color). All these are optional, and need to be written only if necessary.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askUseOptional1

        void askUseOptional1​(java.lang.String value)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user already "activated" the weapon card and wants to use the first optional effect.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with all the information needed to use the said effect: target(*name of the character*) destination(*colorOfSquare-numberOfSquare*) powerup(powerUpName-color). All these are optional, and need to be written only if necessary.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askUseOptional2

        void askUseOptional2​(java.lang.String value)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user already "activated" the weapon card and wants to use the second optional effect.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with all the information needed to use the said effect: target(*name of the character*) destination(*colorOfSquare-numberOfSquare*) powerup(powerUpName-color). All these are optional, and need to be written only if necessary.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askUsePowerUp

        void askUsePowerUp​(java.lang.String value)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user wants to use a power up.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with all the information needed to use the said power up: target(*name of the character*) destination(*colorOfSquare-numberOfSquare*) paga(colorOfAmmoCube). All these are optional, and need to be written only if necessary.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askReload

        void askReload​(java.lang.String value)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user wants to reload a weapon.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with all the information needed to reload: the id of the card that the user wants to reload, and an optional list of power ups he wants to use instead of his ammo cubes.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

        Method that is called when the user wants to end the action he is performing now.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the name of this method.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askCardInfo

        void askCardInfo​(java.lang.String value)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user wants to know some information about a specific card.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with an integer: the id of the card.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • askInfoPowerUp

        void askInfoPowerUp​(java.lang.String value)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method that is called when the user wants to know some information about a specific power up.
        Parameters:
        value - A serialized JsonObject with the name and color of the power up.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
